items.title: OYO to buy iconic Motel 6 brand for $525 million in US expansion bid
items.description: OYOŌĆÖs parent company, Oravel Stays, is buying G6 Hospitality, which controls both the Motel 6 and Studio 6 hotel brands, according to a statement

items.title: SpiceJet QIP allotment: Board approves issue of 48.7 crore shares at issue price of Rs 61.60 per share
items.description: SpiceJet is grappling with multiple woes, including financial challenges, legal battles and grounding of aircraft
